channel.title: Josh 95 first tutorial godsword shards easy

item.title: Josh 95 first tutorial godsword shards easy
item.dc:creator: @josh_95 josh 95
item.description:
@josh_95 wrote:

Hey moparscape, ive bin seeing not a lot of serer have godsword shards so here they are good luck.

Difficulty 1/10
Files modified Client.java (server sided), class 8
Tested on Bluur. Normally it works on most of the servers

Then go into your client to “Class 8”.
There add these ints.

Code:

Then open your file “models”.
There copy all your models (14200, 14201, …)

Then compile and run. Open your client and say

Code:

add model 14200
add model 14201
…

Well done you are finished adding the godsword parts. (again thanks to Jon_)

Now we are going to make them work as in real runescape. (if you use shard 1 and 2 u get shards,… )

Well go to your server and open the “client.java”

Then search for

Code:

if(((itemused ==

Then add this somewhere in there.

Code:

//Godsword stuff
if(((itemUsed == 3649) && (otherItem == 3650))){//gs part 1+2
deleteItem(3649, getItemSlot(3649), 1);
deleteItem(3650, getItemSlot(3650), 1);
addItem(3652, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3650) && (otherItem == 3649))){//gs part 1+2
deleteItem(3649, getItemSlot(3649), 1);
deleteItem(3650, getItemSlot(3650), 1);
addItem(3652, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3649) && (otherItem == 3651))){//gs part 1+3
deleteItem(3649, getItemSlot(3649), 1);
deleteItem(3651, getItemSlot(3651), 1);
addItem(3653, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3651) && (otherItem == 3649))){//gs part 1+3
deleteItem(3649, getItemSlot(3649), 1);
deleteItem(3651, getItemSlot(3651), 1);
addItem(3653, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3650) && (otherItem == 3651))){//gs part 2+3
deleteItem(3650, getItemSlot(3650), 1);
deleteItem(3651, getItemSlot(3651), 1);
addItem(3655, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3651) && (otherItem == 3650))){//gs part 2+3
deleteItem(3650, getItemSlot(3650), 1);
deleteItem(3651, getItemSlot(3651), 1);
addItem(3655, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3652) && (otherItem == 3653))){//gs shards 1+2
deleteItem(3652, getItemSlot(3652), 1);
deleteItem(3653, getItemSlot(3653), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3653) && (otherItem == 3652))){//gs shards 1+2
deleteItem(3652, getItemSlot(3652), 1);
deleteItem(3653, getItemSlot(3653), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3652) && (otherItem == 3655))){//gs shards 1+3
deleteItem(3652, getItemSlot(3652), 1);
deleteItem(3655, getItemSlot(3655), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3655) && (otherItem == 3652))){//gs shards 1+3
deleteItem(3652, getItemSlot(3652), 1);
deleteItem(3655, getItemSlot(3655), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3653) && (otherItem == 3655))){//gs shards 2+3
deleteItem(3653, getItemSlot(3653), 1);
deleteItem(3655, getItemSlot(3655), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3655) && (otherItem == 3653))){//gs shards 2+3
deleteItem(3653, getItemSlot(3653), 1);
deleteItem(3655, getItemSlot(3655), 1);
addItem(3654, 1);
sM(“You have combined the two parts.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3654) && (otherItem == 3656))){//armadyl hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3656, getItemSlot(3656), 1);
addItem(35, 1);//change the 35 to the ID of ags
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3656) && (otherItem == 3654))){//armadyl hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3656, getItemSlot(3656), 1);
addItem(35, 1);//change the 35 to the ID of ags
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3654) && (otherItem == 3657))){//bandos hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3657, getItemSlot(3657), 1);
addItem(667, 1);//change the 667 to the ID of bgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3657) && (otherItem == 3654))){//bandos hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3657, getItemSlot(3657), 1);
addItem(667, 1);//change the 667 to the ID of bgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3654) && (otherItem == 3658))){//saradomin hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3658, getItemSlot(3658), 1);
addItem(2402, 1);//change the 2402 to the ID of sgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3658) && (otherItem == 3654))){//saradomin hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3658, getItemSlot(3658), 1);
addItem(2402, 1);//change the 2402 to the ID of sgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}

if(((itemUsed == 3654) && (otherItem == 3659))){//zamorak hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3659, getItemSlot(3659), 1);
addItem(746, 1);//change the 746 to the ID of zgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}
if(((itemUsed == 3659) && (otherItem == 3654))){//zamorak hilt + blade
deleteItem(3654, getItemSlot(3654), 1);
deleteItem(3659, getItemSlot(3659), 1);
addItem(746, 1);//change the 746 to the ID of zgs
addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID
sM(“You made a godsword and gain some exp.”);
}

//End of godsword stuff

Now compile and run. Well done your finished.

Some extra information about the code :

  1. I made this by my own (wasnt that hard)

  2. If your Id’s of your godsword are different than mine, just edit it.

  3. If you dont want it give you smith exp (45k) just delete
    Code:

addSkillXP(45000, 13);//change the 45000 to the amount of exp you want and the 13 to the skill ID

Now make it as your godwars drop today.
